title: Four-term North Carolina Gov. Jim Hunt, a leader in education reform, dies at 88
description: Hunt's career, including an unprecedented 16 years in the governor's office, provided a prototype for the modern “education governor.”
content: Hunt's career, including an unprecedented 16 years in the governor's office, provided a prototype for the modern “education governor.”
